attributes.action: stop schools being used to promote or facilitate secret abortion and contraceptive advice to children under the legal age of consent without their parent's knowledge or consent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government's plans to expand on-site sexual health clinics providing confidential "services" to all secondary schools will only serve to encourage earlier sexual activity among underage children and to deprive parents of their right to guide their children on moral issues and their duty to protect their children's health.
